divs: sighting detailsi was panning the skies with an infrared camcorder when this solid looking, out of the orinary object came into view. i managed to get around 10 minutes of footage before running out of data space. it was obviously quite a long way away, but it just seemed to hang there. darren ashmore http:\\infrared-aerial-phenomena-research.blogspot.com\ http:\\www.youtube.com\user\daboxash
Summary: Cone shaped UFO captured on IR camera
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
